title: NA LCS Fans Affected by Ticketmaster Verified Fan
body: I received a email from riot about that I was effect, but am confused because I never sent a email out when ya'll the made the post to if you were effected by not being able to purchase with a code but I never received a code after being emailed I was going to receive one, I wanted to make sure this wasn't a fake email or to see if it was.

replies.body: Hey! Thanks for reaching out on this. I can confirm that the email is authentic. NA LCS Events was provided by Ticketmaster a list of codes and emails of Verified Fans who were issued codes but not able to redeem them; we used that list to reach out to everyone registered and granted codes who could have been affected.

Hey my friends said there was another email sent out to those affected, but i have yet to receive mine. I'm told the email has a deadline of tonight to respond, so I was wondering what i could do about this?

Hey AlienLlama-

At this point all emails have been sent out to registered Verified Fans who were unable to redeem their codes. Please check your email spam folder just to be sure! If you have further issues please write Tickets@RiotGames.com. I can confirm that you have a code and should be receiving the email.

Thanks!
I didn't know if the email was authentic or not but I just submitted my info.

I too received this email, and it seems a little fishy.
